description:
He Lives in a single room apartment in the big city. He has a grand dream of having his own personal maid with big tits. One day, his long time friend, Nagisa, came back to him as a maid.
Now what? As her Master, he would train her to satisfy his every desire. Now their sexual exploits with take the all over town; in the room, at the park, on the streets, and using a variety of toys, they will do it all! Horny? Perverted? What will Nagisa, be tomorrow?
title: Maid in Heaven Vol. II
